live_updates: Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.

48636.summary: Some customers in Sault Ste Marie are experiencing an interruption to Television services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48636.title: Apr 15 - Sault Ste. Marie | TV Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
